org.apache.pig.tools.pigstats

Class PigStatusReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.StatusReporter
      • org.apache.pig.tools.pigstats.PigStatusReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable, PigWarnCounter

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class PigStatusReporter
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.StatusReporter
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable, PigWarnCounter

      use incrCounter(java.lang.Enum<?>, long) instead. This method returns MR counter which is not compatible with Tez mode. Use incrCounter() that is compatible with both MR and Tez mode.
